questions.question: What protects individuals' personal information?
questions.explanation: Privacy safeguards personal data from unauthorized access.

questions.question: What EU law regulates data protection?
questions.explanation: GDPR establishes comprehensive European data protection rules.

questions.question: What term describes unfairness in algorithms?
questions.explanation: Bias causes discriminatory outcomes in automated systems.

questions.question: What secures data by encoding it?
questions.explanation: Encryption protects data from unauthorized reading.

questions.question: What right allows users to delete their data?
questions.explanation: This right enables individuals to request data deletion.

questions.question: What makes AI decisions understandable?
questions.explanation: Explainability reveals how AI reaches conclusions.

questions.question: What ensures data is used only as stated?
questions.explanation: Purpose limitation restricts data to specified uses.

questions.question: What document explains data collection?
questions.explanation: Privacy policies detail how organizations handle data.
